title: Koiyum Kangal Lyrics Maatran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: -- "Koiyum Kangal Meiyum Pesuma" | Maatraan
Singers: Karthik, Shreya Ghoshal, Vijay Prakash
Movie: Maatran
Music: Harris Jeyaraj

Nani Koni Rani unthan
Meni nanum moikkiren
Maruthani pootha kani unnai
thaa ne endru kekrien

Ne Thooram Nindral verkiren
en pakkam vanthal pookiren
un yeval aaalai marinen
enai enge yendru thedineen

Neerai Neerai Ne megam thandi varai
Tharai Tharai en thagam thoondi noorai
paavai paavai nan unnal aanen Thenai
Koyum Kangal Meyum pesuma
